resources.string: Failed to get results. Please try again.
A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
Android Developer Nanodegree by Udacity and Google
I used Butter Knife library from Jake Wharton and Picasso library from Square.
Loading and error images made by Freepik from FlatIcon.
This app made by Kirit Bhatt while using lot of learning resources from Udacity Android Developer Training
Thank you to Udacity Android Developer Nanaodegree Team
